body: @zombieadd The afterword says "Does porn need tearjerker? Who would buy it? I still don't know, even though I tried to make sad stories because my editor urged me to make it and I somehow managed to make these works.". Even the author is skeptical about sad porn.
Yaya Hinata is a great artist, it's a style I love to see, but they are sad stories; at least they aren't like those horrible tragic NTR stories with the worst endings possible.
i came here to nut, i can't count how many times i lost my boner
